maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Désolé, madame, je ne vends rien au \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] sauf si le boss me le demande.
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: Sorry Lady, ain't selling stuff to \c[3]Seekers\c[0] unless the boss tells me to.

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Le Boss m'a dit que je devais te vendre le \c[3]\v[item.346.name]\c[0]. Je ne sais pas pourquoi, mais tiens.
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: Boss tells me I gotta sell you the \c[3]One Up\c[0]. Dunno why, but here you go.

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Allez en bas si vous voulez parler au Boss, \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: Go down if you want to talk to the Boss, \c[3]Seeker\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Vous là-bas, \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0]. Cheveux bleus, Cornes, Spheromancer.
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: You there \c[3]Seeker\c[0]. Blue Hair, Spheromancer, horns.

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Le boss m'a parlé d'une femme qu'on doit chercher. Et vous correspondez à la description.
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: Da Boss tells us of a woman we are to look out for. You fit the description.

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Vous avez aidé un certain \c[3]Mick\c[0] il y a peu, pas vrai ?
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: You recently helped a certain \c[3]Mick\c[0], right?

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Bien. Dans ce cas je dois vous demander de descendre les escaliers et de parler avec le Boss.
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: Good. In that case I must ask you to go down the stairs and meet the boss.

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Et un Non n'est pas une réponse acceptable, j'en ai bien peur.
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: A no is not acceptable I'm afraid.

maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.text: Il n'y a aucune raison d'avoir peur. Venez avec moi.
maps/jungle-city/special/parrot-hq-1.jso.orig: There's nothing you have to worry about. Please come with me.
